fields.headline: Sudoku 2,879 hard
fields.bodyText: Fill the grid so that every row, every column and every 3x3 box contains the numbers 1 to 9. For a helping hand call our solutions line on 09068 338 228. Calls cost 60p per minute at all times. Service supplied by ATS. Buy the next issue of the Guardian or subscribe to our Digital Edition to see the completed puzzle.
